name: Coin-Grab Puzzler
description:
This is my first NES game Coin-Grab Puzzler that I first made with Retro Puzzle Maker, and now they went and updated their game engine to create only UNROM games and ruined my NROM Games. So this is just the Initial Demo NROM "Mapper 0" version that has the default 8 levels, along with my updated Custom Graphic's that I just added to it until I figure out how to run the old version of Nes Puzzle Maker on my Mac to Update my NROM games with.

I don't want to create UNROM games, I have NESMaker for that.

All My Games Present and Future will be made available for downloading Free of any Charge or Payment, but If you would like to donate to my Nes Game Making Efforts you can do so here
